scripts.bundle-ios: rm -rf ./build/bundle/ios && mkdir ./build/bundle/ios             && react-native   bundle  --platform ios      --verbose --minify false --dev true  --entry-file ./index.js  --bundle-output ./build/bundle/ios/index.ios.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle/ios
scripts.bundle-android: rm -rf ./build/bundle/android && mkdir ./build/bundle/android && react-native   bundle  --platform android  --verbose --minify false --dev true  --entry-file ./index.js  --bundle-output ./build/bundle/android/index.android.bundle --assets-dest ./build/bundle/android
